column.name: INITIAL_BALANCE
column.comment: subscriber starting balance for prepaid

column.name: BILLING_TYPE
column.comment: 1= Prepaid Product Offering; 2=Postpaid Product Offering

column.name: CONF_OPERATOR_ASSIST_TYPE
column.comment: 0=use access number settings, 1=moderator only , 2=mod or participant ,3=no operator assistance.

column.name: DISABLED_FLAG
column.comment: flag to determine whether this subscriber is disabled or not

column.name: DIRECT_CALL_FLAG
column.comment: Indicates whether the subscriber has the direct call feature enabled.

column.name: REQUIRE_ANI_AUTH_FLAG
column.comment: indicates whether postpaid calling subscriber can be validated via DTMF (F) or only by ANI lookup

column.name: CORP_ACCT_MGR_FLAG
column.comment: indicates whether this subscriber is a corporate account manager

column.name: ALLOW_PIN_ONLY_LOGIN_FLAG
column.comment: Controls whether subscribers can log into the portal with PIN only.

column.name: CALLBACK_NBR_FLAG
column.comment: Specifies whether callback number is enabled or not.

column.name: INCLUDE_IN_COMPANY_DIR_FLAG
column.comment: T if the employee is to be included in the company directory. F if not.

column.name: SIGNUP_DATE
column.comment: Date of signup. Not necessarily first use.

column.name: ACTIVATION_DATE
column.comment: Database Time and Date stamp of when subscriber signed up for account or activated a prepaid calling card.

column.name: FIRST_CALL_DATE
column.comment: Date on which the account is first used to complete a call

column.name: FIRST_USE_DATE
column.comment: first time PIN is validated via the IVR.

column.name: LAST_USE_DATE
column.comment: Last use timestamp for this subscriber account.

column.name: EXPIRATION_DATE
column.comment: date prepaid account is set to expire.

column.name: ZERO_BALANCE_DATE
column.comment: date on which prepaid balance first falls to zero.

column.name: DATE_OF_BIRTH
column.comment: Subscriber DOB

column.name: LAST_CLM_RESET_DATE
column.comment: Timestamp of last credit limit balance reset

column.name: LOT_ID
column.comment: The lot ID that this subscriber was generated with. Only populated if subscriber PIN was auto generated with the batch/lot PIN generation process.

column.name: LOT_SEQ_NUMBER
column.comment: 8 digit lot sequence number À pins are number 10000001 to X where X is the total number of pins for the lot

column.name: CURR_PREPAID_BALANCE
column.comment: current prepaid balance for subscriber

column.name: PIN
column.comment: A pin is the unique number (for a given service provider not across the entire platform) that is given to the subscriber to access the system.

column.name: LOGIN_USER_ID
column.comment: web user ID

column.name: LOT_CONTROL_NUMBER
column.comment: lot control tracking number, this is used as the prefix for pin serial numbers

column.name: POPD_ACCOUNT_NUMBER
column.comment: postpaid account number

column.name: OUTBOUND_CLI
column.comment: CLI to be used for all conference outdials for this subscriber

column.name: LAST_NAME_INDEXED
column.comment: upper case version of last name for fast searches.

column.name: NUM_EXPIRATION_DAYS
column.comment: Number of days prepaid account will expire from first use.

column.name: DISABLED_REASON_CODE
column.comment: reason code why this subscriber has been disabled.

column.name: CONF_SVC_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of conference service ID that this subscriber is associated with

column.name: CORP_ACCT_NBR
column.comment: FK to corporate account

column.name: CORP_DEPT_ID
column.comment: FK to indicate corporate account department this subscriber belongs to

column.name: REJECTED_REASON_CODE
column.comment: Used for postpaid accounts. When a subscriber signs up they can be set to a 'pending authorization' status. Administrators can accept or reject a subscriber's request for services. This field contains the reason codes. The reason codes are service provider specific and come from cust_code_reference.

column.name: TIMEZONE_ID
column.comment: subscriber time zone - FK to timezone_ref

column.name: HOME_COUNTRY_ID
column.comment: The home country of the subscriber

column.name: CREDIT_LIMIT
column.comment: max currency amount that postpaid subscriber is allowed to use per pay period (e.g. month), subscriber initially inherits this from the product offering

column.name: CREDIT_USED
column.comment: The currency amount used by the postpaid subscriber for the current credit limit period (e.g. month)

column.name: SIMUL_CALLS_PER_PIN
column.comment: Max number of simultaneous calls allowed per postpaid pin. Value is inherited from postpaid service, but can be changed at the subscriber level.

column.name: COMPANY_NAME
column.comment: Company name

column.name: MARKET_ID
column.comment: Market_id

column.name: CALLBACK_NBR
column.comment: This will hold the default click to dial phone number.

column.name: PRPD_ACCOUNT_NUMBER
column.comment: The prepaid account number for the subscriber.

column.name: DTMF_NAME
column.comment: For business broadband subscribers, the subscriber name as spelled through the digits on the phone.

column.name: LOGIN_PASSWORD
column.comment: web password. encrypted.

column.name: PIN_PASSWORD
column.comment: password created with prepaid PINs. Used for web authentication

column.name: ORG_NAME
column.comment: Not used.

column.name: BALANCE_NOTIFY_THRESHOLD
column.comment: Associated with prepaid calling card services or postpaid offerings that allow credit limits. Indicates the balance threshold (credit_usage or curr_prepaid_balance) at which a notification is written to sub_notification. 0 = Notifications are disabled.

column.name: SUBSCRIBER_ID
column.comment: The subscriber that generated the activity

column.name: SUBSCRIBER_ID
column.comment: subscriber to which the balance was transferred
